Heart events / conversation responses: BETA: After reaching 8 hearts with Jas and Vincent, the player may trigger a cutscene by entering Cindersap Forest during Spring on a sunny day between 6am and 5pm. During this cutscene, Vincent will show the player how to clean Spring Onions. Afterward, the player will gain "Spring Onion Mastery", which permanently increases the sell price of Spring Onions by 5x. Spring Onion Mastery will show in the player's wallet, on the player tab of the inventory menu.
